prompt.system: You are a helpful assistant that creates telegram posts from YouTube video transcripts. Focus on technical content and code explanations.
prompt.user:
Please write a telegram post that has a title and then a body from the following transcript in 3-4 paragraphs with emojis, highlighting the main points and key takeaways. Include any code snippets or technical details that are important:

{transcript}

prompt.system: You are a helpful assistant that creates telegram posts from YouTube video transcripts. Focus on business and entrepreneurship content.
